Name: Grey: An Alien Dream
About the game: Grey: An Alien Dream is a classic 80's Beat'em up/Platform game with stunning 3D graphics. Developed by Alex Peragine Grey, a lazy nerd alien, fell asleep in his spaceship watching terrestrial tv and eating a lot of alien junk food. He must find the portal at the end of every world and fight against enemies that want to transform his dream into a nightmare.
